Hero.description: Let's move forward together and give stray animals a home.

Showcase.title: Showcase
Showcase.description: Join 1000+ Makers Boosting Conversions with Our Landing Page Boilerplate

Steps.title: Adoption Steps
Steps.step1Description: Choose the animal you want to adopt and fill out the application information.
Steps.step2Description: The platform reviews the application. After passing, sign the contract and pay the deposit.
Steps.step3Description: The platform conducts regular follow-up visits to check the adoption situation. Based on the follow-up results, it decides whether to recover the animal.
Steps.step4Description: Based on the follow-up results, decide whether the adoption can be completed and the deposit will be refunded.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.description: The page you are currently viewing is an open-source, free boilerplate.
Pricing.doYouLike: Do you like this landing page boilerplate?

Testimonials.title: Testimonials
Testimonials.description1: If you use this landing page template and recommend it on your Twitter,
Testimonials.description3: . I will display your tweet and recommendation here.

FAQ.title: FAQs
FAQ.description: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions.

AdoptionCenter.oneMore: Has one now, want to adopt another
AdoptionCenter.oneGive: Pet was given away or released
AdoptionCenter.healthStatus: What health status of the pet can you accept (multiple choice)
AdoptionCenter.isRequired: Please fill in the required fields
AdoptionCenter.hasPetBefore: Have you had pet experience before?
AdoptionCenter.bugget: Your pet care budget is (yuan/month, excluding additional costs such as vaccinations, snacks, toys, and sterilization)

My.r1-2: as a deposit. The deposit and interest will be returned based on the review results: if all follow-ups are passed, the full deposit will be returned; otherwise, the deposit will be returned in proportion to the number of passed follow-ups.
My.r2: 2. If there is a malicious abandonment of the animal, the deposit will not be returned, and the abandonment behavior will be exposed on social media.
